Finding: (iii) Conformance of Audit Test Results to Specifications The audit team conducted in-situ testing of the various components of the works to determine the concrete compressive strength and compare with the specifications. The results are shown in the table below. Twelve tests conducted on Access Ramp, Veranda and splash Apron passed representing 100% conformance.
